summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 10, York Addition, being the alley between 34th Avenue South and 35th Avenue South, from Hinds Street to Horton Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 106378 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
